review_data.title: Delicious and unique "pan" dishes

review_data.title: A real authentic find, great Moroccan food.

review_data.title: Good to meet for drinks or dinner

review_data.title: Good food, great staff

review_data.title: Worth taking time out in this oasis of calm
review_data.content: This restaurant is right on the edge of the Old Town. That means that it is close to the action, but remains undisturbed by the noise of the crowds. Lunches in winter in a tastefully-decorated dining room are good value and always good to eat...More

review_data.title: Nice surprise

review_data.title: Cosy restaurant with excellent food
review_data.content: Food and service are always excellent. Restaurant is clean and has a cosy atmosphere. Not open on Friday and Saturday nights we understand but double check for the time of year you're travelling.
